posts.title: Keep an eye open, strive for best!

contents.innerHTML: Let the Karma play role than start chasing for everything.

We face many things, randomly or planned, willingly or not hence we cannot chase everything though. If you had a fight with someone, feeling cheated or something else be an audience and let the Karma show begin. Sometimes it's amazing to see things working “without you”. And Karma will let it happen in the right way than your way.

Problem is not always a question on you or your abilities. Some problems dissolve with time, let them dissolve. Touching the wound every minute will not going to cure it, let it heal with time. Chasing the right things makes you a wise person, chasing everything may exhaust you in every other way.
Feel the freedom of your decisions, because everyone does what is right — in their opinion.
Don’t drain your strengths, choose the right problems
Focus what you know well, perform on that; the best writer may not sing a song. Let the other things go out of your way, it's okay! Believe me, you are strong, but not everywhere!

Failures work as erasers, success works as pencils — hence you should try to make things work but with preparations. You should not take challenges or problems for granted, because you may be purchasing an eraser for you. Choose wisely.
When you take it, try to make it right

You may not be sure of what’s next? But hard work beats talent, choose that wisely at the right place. Your efforts may make it or not, your sincerity will pay off. Pay attention to small things, advice, suggestions from others before you take a step. Some people are a good coach. And it's fine if you can’t make it right there is another solution to this problem, for sure.
Time is more powerful than anyone here.
You may not be able to it now, but the time takes its own time to make it happen. You may forward your clock but the whole world has its own clocks — trust on time.

Send a thought out and let time take an action on it. And unknowingly you will realize after some time, everything is fine now. Everything settles down here either its thought or something else — some powers work for it.
You are not an actor in every film.
Sit, chill, enjoy some stories or films. You are not an actor in every other story, everyone is playing alive biopic.
When you learn to watch and try to understand their biopics, you will make your biopic better either from mistakes or well played things
Let it go!
When it doesn’t work after what you could do — let it go. There is something best is yet to come. Expectations may kill your happiness, and stops positive vibes.
Open your hands and ready to hug new challenges with all new hopes and aspirations. Take your medicine on time!
— Bhushan

posts.title: Making website HTTPS with Certbot in a minute

contents.innerHTML: SSL is becoming a mandate and we will get it ready for your domain in a minute. There are many vendors (paid and free) but it’s always tough to install it manually. Let's make it happen just with a bot, yes Certbot. Make sure you have a Linux machine to run this. Let's start and fetch the Certbot from web and setup that quickly. I have created a script for this.
wget -O — https://raw.githubusercontent.com/erBhushanPawar/rocking-shell/master/certbot-installer.sh
This script will setup required things on your machine as per Certbot documentations, more details here
Now let's run this script
sudo sh certbot-installer.sh yourdomain.com
Sudo is required because this script installs as root, you can also run using sudo su by making yourself root, but that can be dangerous.
This will ask a few questions to you like email just answer them.

This should identify the installed HTTP server on your Linux server like Apache or nginx and will ask you whether you need to redirect or not. I would prefer auto redirect to HTTPS this will upgrade the traffic from HTTP to HTTPS for your domain.
Happy SSL to you !

Meeting past time over coffee — a thought
posts.details:
Making life easier and cozy is always an amazed dream of everyone than
      making it contentful and happy (intentionally and unintentionally),
      though both are right in its own place.
      But I feel marking it successful has a lot of inclination towards
      "what you feel of your happiness and wins, and how you treat your defeats".
      Because a most significant difference of digesting both is trusting the progress you are
      making....

about.title: About Me
about.innerHTML:
Love to teach computers "how to behave".
An entrepreneur from the heart and innovative by the mind, experiencing full stack development in multiple programming platforms. Try to quote and express me in the industry with learned and developed architectural designs and development of software products.
Like to analyze and compose system designs, load balancing and algorithmic solutions to critical systems. Used to planning, evaluating and building of complex applications, execution of complete SDLC, STLC, Deployment on multiple environments. Love to do integration across services, dependency injection, job schedulers, detection plus rescue services, auto-deploy programs and security algorithms. Experienced about Google, Facebook API integration in products for digital marketing platforms. Installation of server systems, web development and collaboration of it, transaction control with "Redis", "Database Replication", "Linux", "ELK". Had experience as team lead for portals solving "manufacturing industry issues of user and things collaboration" facing in web and powered by Java, MEAN stack with SAP integration.
Currently working as an Application developer, passionate about Angular and helping other teams as SME & Angular core Team member within the organization to groom their knowledge and meet project architecture requirements and guidelines. If you find interesting it would be my pleasure to hear from you.
